Actions.Name: Get my products
Actions.Description: Returns a list of products for the current user.

Actions.Name: When an event occurs
Actions.Description: Trigger an action on an event for the apps in the current account.

Actions.Name: When an app is rated
Actions.Description: Trigger an action when an app is rated.

Actions.Name: When there is a new review
Actions.Description: Trigge an action when there is a new review.
